name: New York Mysteries: High Voltage
description: Fearless journalist Laura is again brought in to investigate strange murders taking place in New York. Immerse yourself in an exciting crime story and solve the mystery of a dangerous criminal surrounded by lightning!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space

reviews.review_text: God point&and click / hidden object game. Good graphics, good puzzles, interesting story. Recommended
Love all the New York mysteries games. Good mix of challenging and easier mini games. Great graphics
